professional_summary: Experienced Oracle Database Administrator with expertise in Real Application Cluster (RAC), ASM, Data Guard, Golden Gate Replication, and Performance Tuning using AWR and STATSPACK. Proven track record in database maintenance, backup, recovery, and schema optimization.

key_responsibilities: Installed and maintained Oracle 11g RAC/ASM on Redhat Enterprise Linux 5.x boxes.
Implemented Data Guard Physical Standby using DG Broker and experienced with Active Data Guard and Snapshot Standby.
Configured Golden Gate Replication (unidirectional and bidirectional) and added tables to existing configurations.
Performed Data Guard switchover/failover as required.
Monitored and tuned database performance using AWR
Configured and maintained Oracle 11g RAC/ASM on various platforms.
Implemented Data Pump for database reorganization and migration between 9i
Used conventional export/import utilities for cloning/migration of small databases.
Performed regular monitoring and analysis using AWR
